attributes.action: Introduce a bill to jail MP's under a sedition act for not putting the UK first.
attributes.additional_details: MP's shouldn't be able to make campaign promises to get elected then do whatever they want once in government. It's time our politicians were held accountable for not putting the interest of the UK first. Foreign spending shouldn't be considered when the national debt is above 1 trillion. We shouldn't be involved in foreign conflicts without referendum. It's time there were checks and balances to make sure the countries best interest are put before foreign interests and MP's personal ideology.
attributes.background: Any MP's that doesn't make good on at least 90% of manifesto promises, approves reckless foreign spending, does political favours for personal gain, approves dangerous foreign policy without referendum, doesn't protect our borders, should be on trial for sedition.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035

Additionally, offences are a matter for the police and courts, not Parliament or Government. Petitions must call for a clear action from the UK Government or Parliament.
